title: Fraction Operations
description: Solve fraction addition and subtraction equations

words.fact: Three quarters minus one quarter equals one half — subtraction with fractions!
Two thirds plus one third equals one whole — complementary fractions!
One half plus one third equals five sixths — adding unlike denominators!
Five eighths minus three eighths equals one quarter — or two eighths!
Seven eighths minus one eighth equals three quarters — or six eighths simplified!
One half minus one third equals one sixth — subtracting unlike denominators!
